alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lafayette; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 10:34PM CDT until June 13 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Southwestern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northwestern Claiborne Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1033 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bradley, or 17 miles southwest of Lewisville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springhill, Homer, Haynesville, Cullen, Sarepta, Fouke, Bradley, Taylor, Emerson, Shongaloo, Bussey, Canfield, Atlanta, Welcome, Leton, Pleasant Valley, Gin City, Walkerville, Spring Lake and State Line. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to shelter inside a strong building, and stay away from windows.
